ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions that implement the known population median test.
Functions that implement the known population median test.

name: r-kpmt
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-kpmt
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/kpmt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/kpmt/kpmt_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6342ad02c93bfa7a764d028821bb6115bb8bc8c55b057a5860736cc0e034a295

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-matrixstats
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-matrixstats

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('kpmt')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('kpmt')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=kpmt
  license: MIT
  summary: Functions that implement the known population median test.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: 
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE
    
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: kpmt
# Version: 0.1.0
# Date: 2017-07-28
# Title: Known Population Median Test
# Description: Functions that implement the known population median test.
# Author: Matthew M Parks <map2085@med.cornell.edu>
# Maintainer: Matthew M Parks <map2085@med.cornell.edu>
# Imports: matrixStats, stats, methods, utils
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2017-07-31 17:04:17 UTC; map2085
# Depends: R (>= 2.10)
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2017-08-01 04:51:06 UTC
